title: Installation issue: libbsd
body:
### Spack version
<!-- Add the output to the command below -->
```console
$ spack --version
0.14.1-415-cbcac72
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install libbsd%xl@16.1

     79     checking whether -lc should be explicitly linked in... no
  >> 80     checking dynamic linker characteristics... /usr/tce/packages/xl/xl-2020.03.18/xlC/16.1.
            1/bin/.orig/xlc_r: error: 1501-294 No input file specified. Please use -qhelp for more 
            information.
     81     GNU/Linux ld.so
     82     checking how to hardcode library paths into programs... immediate
     83     checking whether stripping libraries is possible... yes
     84     checking if libtool supports shared libraries... yes
     85     checking whether to build shared libraries... yes
     86     checking whether to build static libraries... yes

     ...

     229      CC       setproctitle.lo
     230    Warning: Combining -g with -O2 cannot generate GPU debug info in the current Nvidia too
            l chain
     231      CC       strlcat.lo
     232    Warning: Combining -g with -O2 cannot generate GPU debug info in the current Nvidia too
            l chain
     233      CC       strlcpy.lo
     234    Warning: Combining -g with -O2 cannot generate GPU debug info in the current Nvidia too
            l chain
  >> 235    setproctitle.c:284:1: error: 1540-2991 The expression is not supported.
     236    libbsd_symver_default(setproctitle, setproctitle_impl, LIBBSD_0.5);
     237    ^
     238    ./local-link.h:36:2: note: expanded from macro 'libbsd_symver_default'
     239            __asm__(".symver " #symbol "," #alias "@@" #version)
     240            ^
     241    1 error generated.
  >> 242    Error while processing setproctitle.c.
  >> 243    make[2]: *** [setproctitle.lo] Error 1
     244    make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
     245      CC       stringlist.lo
     246    Warning: Combining -g with -O2 cannot generate GPU debug info in the current Nvidia too
            l chain
     247    Warning: Combining -g with -O2 cannot generate GPU debug info in the current Nvidia too
            l chain
     248    make[2]: Leaving directory `/tmp/quellyn/spack-stage/spack-stage-libbsd-0.10.0-sep4gmmh
            7gv4ghkdk2oj2sbspjkvulbo/spack-src/src'
  >> 249    make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
     250    make[1]: Leaving directory `/tmp/quellyn/spack-stage/spack-stage-libbsd-0.10.0-sep4gmmh
            7gv4ghkdk2oj2sbspjkvulbo/spack-src'
  >> 251    make: *** [all] Error 2
```

### Platform and user environment

```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux rzansel61 4.14.0-115.10.1.1chaos.ch6a.ppc64le #1 SMP Thu Aug 8 15:51:58 PDT 2019 ppc64le ppc64le ppc64le GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:	Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server release 7.6 (Maipo)
``` 

### Additional information

```console
$ spack spec --install-status libbsd%xl@16.1

Input spec
--------------------------------
 -   libbsd%xl@16.1

Concretized
--------------------------------
 -   libbsd@0.10.0%xl@16.1 fflags="-qzerosize"  arch=linux-rhel7-power9le
```

$ spack log-parse --show=errors,warnings config.log
